column5: How about a Cheetah in B.C.?  http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/british-columbia/cheetah-loose-creston-crawford-bay-1.3371078
Not a good wnough pic for the MNR???  Thats crazy!!!

It's better than any photo that's been offered as "proof" of a wild population in Ontario... and should also give pause for others that would suggest that a photo alone is sufficient proof that there is a wild population.
Hahaha.. she wanted to get it into the back of her car.. not a passenger I'd want!!
Ahh, it would be ok if it was wearing a seat belt!!!
